data.message: When debugging "file not created" issues, check TWO things: (1) sys.path order - Python imports from the FIRST matching module found, so sys.path.insert(0, path) makes that path take priority over local files; (2) dataclass enum serialization - asdict() preserves enum objects which json.dump() can't serialize, causing TypeError mid-write and corrupted/truncated files. Fix: convert enum to .value before json.dump.
